item.title: Artisan Craft
item.description: This handcrafted pottery reflects our communityâ€™s skill and dedication to preserving traditional craftsmanship.

item.title: Traditional Dance
item.description: This image captures the energy of our traditional dance, performed during the annual harvest festival. The dancers wear colorful attire, symbolizing unity and celebration.
